description: This file defines the OCRService class, which provides an abstraction layer for extracting text from documents using OCR. It includes a method extract_text that returns placeholder OCR output and JSON details, intended to be replaced with actual OCR integrations.

classes.name: OCRService
classes.description: A class providing an OCR abstraction for integrating OCR engines like Tesseract, AWS Textract, or GCV. It currently returns stub data for development purposes.

methods.name: Tuple[str,dict] extract_text(self, abs_path: str, mime_type: Optional[str] = None)
methods.description: Extracts text from a specified file, returning both the extracted text and JSON metadata. Currently a placeholder implementation.

ctags.name: extract_text
ctags.pattern: /^    def extract_text(self, abs_path: str, mime_type: Optional[str] = None) -> Tuple[str, dict]:$/
